HelpXML.Title: FSMbonfbound
HelpXML.Purpose: FSMbonfbound computes Bonferroni bounds for each step of the search (in mult analysis)

Item.Name: n
Item.LongDesc: Number of observations on which the envelopes are based.

Item.Name: p
Item.LongDesc: Number of variables on which the envelopes are based.

Item.Name: init
Item.ShortDesc: Point where to start monitoring required diagnostics
Item.LongDesc: Note that if bsb is supplied, init>=length(bsb). If init is not specified it will be set equal to floor(0.5*(n+p+1))+1.

Item.Name: prob
Item.ShortDesc: quantiles for which envelopes have to be computed
Item.LongDesc: Vector containing 1 x k elements . The default is to produce 1 per cent, 50 per cent and 99 per cent envelopes.

Item.Name: distrib
Item.LongDesc: The statistical distribution used to compute the approximated Bonferroni bounds. Distributions implemented are 'chi2' and 'F' (default).

Item.Name: Bbound
Item.LongDesc: Matrix with n-m0+1 rows and length(prob)+1 columns: 1st col = fwd search index from m0 to n-1, 2nd col = bound for quantile prob[1], 3rd col = bound for quantile prob[2], ..., (k+1) col = bound for quantile prob[k].
